"Let me explain what this is all about.": "Complete this test and you'll have permission to join the new Techer class."
"The Techer class was added because ARKS keeps on growing and we need to further differentiate our roles."
"Techers are similar to Forces, and they're not a new concept. In fact, Techers were once in wide use until ARKS membership started to dwindle."
"As for the details on Techer class abilities, you should probably just see for yourself after the test."
